member.name: ColorMatrixEffect.GetParameters
member.summary: The ColorMatrixEffect.GetParameters method gets the elements of the current 5x5 color matrix of this ColorMatrixEffect object.
member.param: Pointer to a UINT that specifies the size, in bytes, of a structure.
Pointer to a structure that receives the elements of the color matrix.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: ColorMatrixEffect.SetParameters
member.summary: The ColorMatrixEffect.SetParameters method sets the 5x5 color matrix of this ColorMatrixEffect object.
member.param: Pointer to a object that specifies the 5x5 color matrix.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.
